lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won the World Cup downhill in Val d’Isère, France, her first of the season, and closed the gap on the overall leader, Maria Riesch of Germany, who finished 24th.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won the World Cup downhill in Val d’Isère, France, her first of the season, and closed the gap on the overall leader, Maria Riesch of Germany, who finished 24th.
